title: Runeterra's Lore? Possible theory to the history of the planet
body:
Taric is from one of the other planets that the Targonians settled, since they used to be a space faring race, I'm assuming that the rune wars destroyed (the space capabilities of) the homeworld of runeterra. with the squabbling that is mentioned in Aurelion Sol's lore page, I'm assuming this was the council of great mages that ended up binding Sol, they disputed over what he would do, finally causing a large war between their respective groups. (groups such as the long ago peoples that formed shurima, & the yordles, the human(ish) factions that formed noxus and demacia, and their respective inner portions that would form zaun and piltover. with possibly beings from the crystal scar included in the bunch and they dove underground to hide from the destruction of their home [with skarner being the only one left] and the people who settled and lived in and around ionia (which also could've been a faction in the first group.) 

Sol's lore says that the very old runeterrans were space-faring and this could be how and why the yordles have spaceships in bandle city. (even though they dont know or remember what they are.) These ships couldve been from so long ago that none of the beings who exist on runeterra remembering. The variety of species that exist on runeterra lead me to believe that the targonians assimilated races into their fold similar to what the covenant does in halo. with the rune wars any class system that existed could've been thoroughly destroyed as anyone left would have to be scrounging for whatever soldiers and mages they could get their hands on. 

Idk if any of this would actually come true in lore, especially considering that most of it has been deemed too old to be cannon anymore(im still a little fuzzy on what rito decied to retcon out)

And guys, please don't be mean to the riot employees, if it was part of your job to sit on the forums for lets assume about two hours, would you really enjoy getting told you are failing at your job by large quantities of people? would that make this aspect of your job slightly fun? or a massive chore that you spend the hour leading up to dreading? be nice to rito, they have a lot that we want from them, and it takes time to get things sorted and working and coherent. also thank you sharjo for being civil about answering that! <3 much love to rito and the nice part of the NA community

replies.body: I still don't understand how the Targonians can be space-faring - or anyone on Runeterra for that matter.

We don't really know yet what the Targonians are truellly like given that everyone in targon currently is an empowered rakkor or member of some other group in the case of Diana, its very possible the aspects that gave them the power are the true targonians.
I believe this is correct, the targonians are the aspects and they are "space-faring In that they possess people on multiple planets a cross the universe.

Assuming that riot doesn't burn what they previously had for lore, it can be assumed that the targonians developed the tech to travel and colonize other planets. And then promptly blew all of the information and data for it up and out of the people of runeterra's minds. possibly destroying all of their old colonies in the process. with what were summoners (before lore changes, assuming again that they are actually removed from lore) stopping all of this to prevent the destruction of the homeland and such. think soldiers putting down their weapons and deciding not to fight, similar concept

Also Rune Wars probably took part in the destruction of this information, like the burning of Alexandria's library, with only some of the information left for us, think the key relics from Halo or Homeworld (especially Homeworld). Mayhaps it is all intact in some great library, just forgotten to the masses rn.

Or maybe there was a third side, a larger enemy that quashed them, like Balrog to the Dwarves. Void definietely qualifies.

Maybe it was both at the same time.

I would be very surprised if they took a tech based approach to space-faring rather than magic based (think Riftwar Saga) given the general theme of the game.  I can see them open portals to other planets, transforming into 'energy beings' that can travel through space, or something like that be I don't see spaceships fitting with the world as it exists and the uproar if they went that direction would dwarf the previous lore-based outrages.
